javadoc:
This class provides a storage mechanism for String-valued information about
  the elements of a KeyIndexableSet, e.g. the vertices of a DirectedGraph.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: name
params.comment: The name used to identify this attribute.

params.name: set
params.comment:
The KeyIndexableSet whose elements can be assigned
 a value within this attribute.

methods.name: setValue
methods.comment: Set the value of this attribute for the specified KeyedObject.

params.name: o
params.comment:
The KeyedObject that is assigned the value. Should
 be a member of the owningSet.

params.name: value
params.comment: The value to associate with the specified KeyedObject.

return.comment:
true if the value could be set. Return false if o is
 not a member of the owningSet.

methods.name: getValue
methods.comment: Return the value associated to the specied KeyedObject.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the elements of the owningSet sorted by their
 values of this Attribute.
methods.name: toSortedArray
methods.comment:
Returns the elements of the owningSet sorted by their
 values of this Attribute.

methods.javadoc:
Sorts the array of keyedObjects by their values of this 
 Attribute.
methods.name: toSortedArray
methods.comment:
Sorts the array of keyedObjects by their values of this 
 Attribute.

methods.javadoc:
Return the type of Attribute, i.e. what kind of values does
 this attribute hold. "Long", "Object", "Double" are examples.
methods.name: attributeType
methods.comment:
Return the type of Attribute, i.e. what kind of values does
 this attribute hold. "Long", "Object", "Double" are examples.

methods.javadoc: Removes all assigned values of this attribute.
methods.name: clear
methods.comment: Removes all assigned values of this attribute.

methods.javadoc: Return the attribute of the specified KeyedObject as a String.
methods.name: getValueAsString
methods.comment: Return the attribute of the specified KeyedObject as a String.

name: StringAttribute
comment:
This class provides a storage mechanism for String-valued information about
  the elements of a KeyIndexableSet, e.g. the vertices of a DirectedGraph.
